sentences: Benjamin Biolay (French pronunciation: ​[bɛ̃ʒamɛ̃ bjɔlɛ]; born 20 January 1973) is a French singer, songwriter, record producer, musician and actor.
He wrote or performed most of the songs on the 2004 soundtrack to Clara et Moi by Arnaud Viard, and released the album Home with his wife the same year.
Benjamin was married to actress and singer Chiara Mastroianni from 2002 to 2005; they have a daughter, Anna, born 22 April 2003.
